result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher J L Hill was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Christopher J L Hill is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Christopher J L Hill was found guilty of Strangulation and Suffocation [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.235(1).
  • Christopher J L Hill was found guilty of Criminal Damage to Property [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).
  • Christopher J L Hill was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $250 DNA surcharge remitted. $268  to be collected by the Dept of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.  The balance remaining at release from prison be paid as a condition of extended supervison or parole at a rate determined by the supervising agent.
Defendant shall not threaten or direct any acts of physical violence toward AL.

Rules set by probation agent.  Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample.

timeConds.notes:
8/27/15 Crt orders 9 mo conditional jail time with the remainder of time to be stayed upon completion of Domestic Violence Programming and an AODA assessment and completion of recommended treatment.
4/18/16 Crt orders remaining conditional jail time to be stayed.

supervisions.notes: Costs in the amount of $253 in Count #3 of Case #14CF906 to be collected by Dept of Corrections as a condition of probation in ct 1.
Costs in the amount of $243 in Count #4 of Case #14CF906 to be collected by Dept of Corrections as a condition of probation in ct 1.
